responseText:
The challenges we face require more than just strong arms and sharp axes. Flinthelm's work on the constructs' nature is vital, but we also need to bolster our own craft, rediscover the lost arts of our ancestors if we're to truly reclaim Mt. Dun and equip our forces adequately.

There's a smith here in Hammer Rest, an old master of forge lore named Bindur Flatfoot. See if you can help him.
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_CommanderThraenDunzchasm_17_Response
